product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).

The weight of minor components such as ( but not limited to ) threads , buttons , zippers , embellishments and prints.
The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components. Based on this , we calculate how much of the weight is made up of each material. For sets and multipacks , all parts are counted together as one product in the calculations.
Material : Cotton , Denim
Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Sustainability
Getting dressed shouldn’t feel like a moral dilemma. Our high sustainability standards reduce our impact on the planet , better the lives of apparel workers and make it easy for you to look good with a clean conscience. We share our sustainability insights across the apparel industry , simply because it’s the right thing to do.
Go Green

About this Style
Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501® Originals , right ? With a classic straight leg and iconic styling , they’re literally the blueprint for every pair of modern jeans in existence—burned into the world’s collective cortex ever since Levi Strauss ( the man himself !) introduced them in 1873. To this day they’ve never gone out of style. And they never will.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).

The weight of minor components such as ( but not limited to ) threads , buttons , zippers , embellishments and prints.
The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components. Based on this , we calculate how much of the weight is made up of each material. For sets and multipacks , all parts are counted together as one product in the calculations.
Material : Cotton , Denim
Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Description : • 14 oz jean denim • Hidden stud design • Double playing cards • Double-sided large “E” red flag • Double-needle double-arc pocket flower design • Made in Japan

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Sustainability
Getting dressed shouldn’t feel like a moral dilemma. Our high sustainability standards reduce our impact on the planet , better the lives of apparel workers and make it easy for you to look good with a clean conscience. We share our sustainability insights across the apparel industry , simply because it’s the right thing to do.
Go Green

About this Style
Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501® Originals , right ? With a classic straight leg and iconic styling , they’re literally the blueprint for every pair of modern jeans in existence—burned into the world’s collective cortex ever since Levi Strauss ( the man himself !) introduced them in 1873. To this day they’ve never gone out of style. And they never will.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

The weight of minor components such as ( but not limited to ) threads , buttons , zippers , embellishments and prints.
The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components. Based on this , we calculate how much of the weight is made up of each material. For sets and multipacks , all parts are counted together as one product in the calculations.
Material : Cotton , Denim
Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Getting dressed shouldn’t feel like a moral dilemma. Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501® Originals , right ? Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Sustainability
Getting dressed shouldn’t feel like a moral dilemma. Our high sustainability standards reduce our impact on the planet , better the lives of apparel workers and make it easy for you to look good with a clean conscience. Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501® Originals , right ? With a classic straight leg and iconic styling , they’re literally the blueprint for every pair of modern jeans in existence—burned into the world’s collective cortex ever since Levi Strauss ( the man himself !) introduced them in 1873. The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components together. Based on that , we calculate how much of that weight is made out by each material. For sets & multipacks all pieces are counted together as one product in calculations.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.

Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

cotton

elastane

polyester

The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components together. Based on that , we calculate how much of that weight is made out by each material. For sets & multipacks all pieces are counted together as one product in calculations.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

By choosing products that contain Cotton ( BCI ), you are supporting the Better Cotton Initiative ? s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive , while protecting and restoring the environment. BCI applies a mass balance system , which means that the cotton is mixed with conventional cotton in a complex supply chain. Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

the LYCRA ? fibers we use are high performance stretch fibers which hold a Gold Level Material Health Certificate from the Cradle to Cradle Products Innovation Institute.
By choosing products that contain Cotton ( BCI ), you are supporting the Better Cotton Initiative ? s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive , while protecting and restoring the environment. BCI applies a mass balance system , which means that the cotton is mixed with conventional cotton in a complex supply chain. Because the end product may therefore not actually contain Better Cotton , we choose not to rank it.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Getting dressed shouldn’t feel like a moral dilemma. Our high sustainability standards reduce our impact on the planet , better the lives of apparel workers and make it easy for you to look good with a clean conscience. Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501® Originals , right ? With a classic straight leg and iconic styling , they’re literally the blueprint for every pair of modern jeans in existence—burned into the world’s collective cortex ever since Levi Strauss ( the man himself !) introduced them in 1873. Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Care guide
You too can help the environment and make fashion more sustainable. Bring unwanted clothes or home textiles to any H & M store and they will be reworn , reused or recycled.

Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Getting dressed shouldn’t feel like a moral dilemma. Close your eyes. Think “jeans.” Now open. They were 501® Originals , right ? Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

We exclude the weight of minor components such as , but not exclusively : threads , buttons , zippers , embellishments and prints.
The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components together. Based on that , we calculate how much of that weight is made out by each material. For sets & multipacks all pieces are counted together as one product in calculations.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Explanation of the materials in this product
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.
Elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).
Polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester that is made from PET bottles or used textiles. The PET bottles or textile waste are recycled mechanically and processed into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber harvested from the cotton plant.

Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber that is made from oil ( a fossil resource ).

Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester

product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

Recycled cotton is cotton produced from waste from textile production or used textiles. The waste is recycled mechanically and spun into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

By choosing products that contain Cotton ( BCI ), you are supporting the Better Cotton Initiative ? s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive , while protecting and restoring the environment. BCI applies a mass balance system , which means that the cotton is mixed with conventional cotton in a complex supply chain. Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

the LYCRA ? fibers we use are high performance stretch fibers which hold a Gold Level Material Health Certificate from the Cradle to Cradle Products Innovation Institute.
By choosing products that contain Cotton ( BCI ), you are supporting the Better Cotton Initiative ? s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive , while protecting and restoring the environment. BCI applies a mass balance system , which means that the cotton is mixed with conventional cotton in a complex supply chain. Because the end product may therefore not actually contain Better Cotton , we choose not to rank it.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).

product_name: LEVI'S® LVC SERIES 1967 505™ LOW-RISE SLIM STRAIGHT JEANS
product_description:
Series : LEVI'S® VINTAGE CLOTHING ( LVC ) reproduces the tailoring , fabrics and details of the past , faithfully telling the spirit of American culture. Over the past 150 years , the United States has embraced the collision and changes of various cultures , and Levi's® has always stood at the center of it all. Today , LEVI'S® LVC is inspired by the historical events and culture of a specific period to create products for each season , taking you to relive these precious years : surfing on the California beaches in the 1940 s , participating in the space race in the 1950 s , or participating in the space race in the 1950 s. It is to watch a movie " ROCKERS " from the 1970 s... It is so lifelike that it reminds people where they come from and where they are going. What a great thing , a great 150 th anniversary. In the spring and summer of 2023, the LEVI'S® LVC series is inspired by Levi's® and Jacob Davis's stud reinforcement patent to restore the legendary beginning of denim.

Materials in this product explained
Cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant.
Lyocell
Lyocell is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood , but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.
Organic cotton
Organic cotton is cotton grown without the use of artificial pesticides or fertilisers and contains no genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ).
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
Tencel™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™
TENCEL™ Lyocell x REFIBRA™ is a regenerated cellulose fibre made from recycled cotton production waste and wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

Explanation of the materials used in this product
Recycled cotton
Recycled cotton is made from textile waste from production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.
Recycled polyester
Recycled polyester is made from polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) bottles or end-of-life textile waste. PET bottles or textile waste are mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.
cotton
Cotton is a soft and versatile natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant.
elastane
Elastane is an elastic synthetic fiber made from petroleum ( a fossil resource ).
polyester
Polyester is a synthetic fiber made from crude oil ( a fossil resource ).
